title: Hero MotoCorp sales rise 19 pc to 6,37,050 units in September
description: Hero MotoCorp recorded a 19 per cent increase in wholesales to 6,37,050 units in September. Domestic sales rose to 6,16,706 units, while exports reached 20,344 units. The company attributes this growth to positive industry sentiment and a robust pipeline of bookings ahead of the festive season starting October 3.
